path: /St. Julian 2013 Reserve Late Harvest Riesling (Lake Michigan Shore)

data.description: Pineapple rind, lemon pith and orange blossom start off the aromas. The palate is a bit more opulent, with notes of honey-drizzled guava and mango giving way to a slightly astringent, semidry finish.
data.title: St. Julian 2013 Reserve Late Harvest Riesling (Lake Michigan Shore)
